attributes.action: Close down the Princess Diana charity fund and refund everybody who made a donationl
attributes.additional_details: I did not make a donation to this charity fund for the money to be stolen by party political activists and used to promote left wing policies.  If the fund is not to be closed down, the Trustees should be sacked and if that is not to be made to happen, I demand that my GBP100.00p donation be refunded, so that I may burn the money to deny it to the left wing pinkoes currently raping the fund.
